the lattice constant is 1

For a primitive simple cubic cell with the chosen lattice constant, the reciprocal vectors are [1. 0. 0.], [0. 1. 0.] and [0. 0. 1.] and the volume is 1

For a primitive body centred cubic cell with the chosen lattice constant, the reciprocal vectors are [0. 1. 1.], [1. 0. 1.] and [1. 1. 0.] and the volume is 0.5

For a primitive face centred cubic cell with the chosen lattice constant, the reciprocal vectors are [-1.  1.  1.], [ 1. -1.  1.] and [ 1.  1. -1.] and the volume is 0.25
